name: LoopBot (LoLQa)
description:
loopbot is a platform game about a robot trying to heal its creator and will have to explore difficult maps to achieve it

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

SPACE or F to dash and push boxes around

R to reset

the idea of the game is to push boxes with your dash to make them loop so you can jump on them

CREDITS

Lolqa: game desing, level design, coding

Lexany14: Graphics, History

Chin Burgos: Music
